mapper.select: select seq, id, title, content, major, college, rdate, auth, wdate from calendar where id=#{id} and substr(rdate, 1, 6)=${yyyyMM} and auth=3 and major=#{major} and college=#{college} or (substr(rdate, 1, 6)=${yyyyMM} and auth=1 and major=#{major} and college=#{college})
mapper.insert: insert into calendar(id, title, content, major, college, auth, rdate, wdate) values (#{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{major}, #{college}, #{auth}, #{rdate}, now())
insert into blacklist(id, blockid, reason, adddate) values (#{id}, #{blockid}, #{reason}, now());
insert into blacklist(id, word, reason, adddate) values (#{id}, #{word}, #{reason}, now());
